page.title: 18Lifestyles in Ufton Village.
page.content: Life in Ufton tends to be quiet unless people are prepared to be sociable.There is a full programme of events which are published every month. An amenities committee raises money to buy things that are needed in the community.Older residents are happy with the state of affairs although both old and new residents regret the closure of the school.(This is now a private home.) Children travel by bus to Long Itchington and Harbury to school-there are school bus services.Clubs exist for recreational purposes such as whist drives and bingo.Newer residents tend to live in recently renovated buildings or new detached houses.They have come to the village for it's situation and commute to work.
